ValidationRule.description: If the user selects '45916: HFCS Pump Kit', then they have to also select 46409: Regulator Vacuum (Series 7000)
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(ISPICKVAL(FS_Pump_Kit__c, '45916 : HFCS Pump Kit'),
NOT( ISPICKVAL(FS_Vacuum_Regulator__c, '46409 : Regulator Vacuum (Series 7000)')), AND(OR(ISPICKVAL(FS_Platform_Type__c, '7000'), ISPICKVAL(FS_Platform_Type__c, '7100')),
NOT( ISNEW() ) ))
